needs: ["Quick quote and instant coverage confirmation", "Affordable monthly premium with flexible payment date", "Clear explanation of what is covered vs. excluded"]
objections: ["Price sensitivity: 'This feels expensive for my budget'", "Low trust: 'I don’t want hidden fees or surprises'", "Decision friction: 'I need to compare 2–3 more options'"]

channel: Outbound call after webinar / content download
needs: ["Family protection: coverage that fits spouse + kids", "Help choosing coverage amount (not sure what’s enough)", "Bundling options and discounts"]
objections: ["Complexity: 'Too many options — I don’t know what to pick'", "Commitment anxiety: 'What if my situation changes?'", "Time: 'I’m busy, I can’t deal with paperwork'"]

needs: ["Human guidance and reassurance (prefers phone/in-person)", "Predictable payments and simple policy structure", "Confidence the provider will handle claims smoothly"]
objections: ["Skepticism: 'Insurance companies don’t pay when needed'", "Process concerns: 'I don’t want complicated digital steps'", "Value doubt: 'I’m not sure I really need this now'"]
